content: the kit including the pattern and the yarn is available at dried squid knits website 20% off - the kit is on sale on dried squid knits website through december 31 2024 happy holidays the dhg ghost yarn is lightweight silky but durable and available in the most adorable colors this crochet kit is great for beginners the pattern features a standing double_crochet stitch and the yarn is so easy to work with it s great for practicing gauge between fingers
